name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scam Takedown Task Force Site Scanner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans websites against the Scam Takedown Task Force database and warns you if a site is in our Database

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are millions of websites out there currently that are being run by organizations that take your money and run with little you can do about it. Our Site Scanner is designed to provide an easy way to feel a little bit safer about those sites.

The Site Scanner takes the website that you visit and checks it against our database. If it comes back as a hit, it displays a warning at the top of the website telling you that the website is reported as a scam.

We aim to spread awareness with our Site Scanner tool, so be sure to show others what this tool can do too!
